body_html: OK, we should fix those two segfaults, not change all ints to int64_ts. In CUDA, 64-bit arithmetic is substantially more expensive. In C++, int is special in a way that int64_t isn't. Most integral literals are int. The result of a bunch of arithmetic operations is int. (For example uint8_t + uint8_t -> int).

body: OK, we should fix those two segfaults, not change all `int`s to `int64_t`s. In CUDA, 64-bit arithmetic is substantially more expensive. In C++, `int` is special in a way that `int64_t` isn't. Most integral literals are `int`. The result of a bunch of arithmetic operations is `int`. (For example `uint8_t + uint8_t -> int`).
